Summary: Glowing orange object, split into 4, glowed bright and flew around.
divs: sighting detailsi was in monroe, ohio going to a friends house. sitting in the back of the car and looking out the left window i noticed a glowing orange\red object falling from the sky. i thought it may have been a meteor then, but i had never seen one and wasn't sure. i pointed it out and everyone in the car started looking at it also thinking it was a meteor. as it got closer to earth the object broke into 4 glowing orange\red falling objects, which further convinced us it was a meteor falling and breaking up. the objects falling then became 3, and disappeared for 3 seconds, only to be immediately replaced by 3 bright white 'stars' (as they seemed to be). these stars stayed in that place for a few more seconds while we started trying to figure out what they were, when the 3 'stars' rose up a bit in unison and began to go forward over the fields. there seemed to be a very faint orange line connecting the 3 'stars'. then another 'star' appeared and joined the others, connected by the same thin thread. we followed it in the car the best we could (probably about a mile away?)for 4 minutes, the whole time it continued flying over the fields, adding a 5th star at one point, and then loosing 2, and 1 reappearing, and eventually there were only 2 'stars' and then they disappeared, getting too low behind trees for us to see. i am not sure if it or they landed or simply became invisible, and we did not investigate.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Lebanon
There were no other sightings in Lebanon on or around September 29th 2012
